Method CreateTexture

SimulationFramework.SkiaSharp

SimulationFramework.SkiaSharp.dll

CreateTexture(int, int, Span<Color>, TextureOptions)

Creates a new bitmap with the provided data.

public ITexture CreateTexture(int width, int height, Span<Color> data, TextureOptions options = TextureOptions.None)

Parameters

width int

The width of the bitmap, in pixels.

height int

The height of the bitmap, in pixels.

data Span<Color>

The initial raw bitmap data. Must be of length width * height.

options TextureOptions

Returns

ITexture

The new ITexture.
